CatDescriptText: Mr. Madison Campbell, 1712 Brushton Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 2, 1957, pg. 2, with question: "Do you believe that one political party should be in control of all the offices in the city, county, and state?" answer reads: "No, I don't think so."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Madison Campbell, wearing fedora and dark belted and zippered jacket with quilted yoke and collar, standing on sidewalk next to brick building
